questions.question_text_1: Which of the following is/are supervised learning task(s)?
question_texts: Which of the following is/are supervised learning task(s)?

options.option_text: Predicting future sales of a product based on the past sales data.
Reducing the dimensionality of images while retaining essential features,enabling efficient storage and transmission.
Recognizing and interpreting handwritten characters or words, often used indigit recognition or reading handwritten text.
Categorizing text documents into predefined classes, such as spam or non-spam emails.

questions.question_text_1: Let A and B be symmetric matrices such that AB = BA. Then which of the following options is/are true?
question_texts: Let A and B be symmetric matrices such that AB = BA. Then which of the following options is/are true?

options.option_text: AB is not a symmetric matrix.
